resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to

auto_delete_on_idle.description: The ISO 8601 timespan duration of the idle interval after which the

default_message_ttl.description: The ISO 8601 timespan duration of the TTL of messages sent to this

duplicate_detection_history_time_window.description: The ISO 8601 timespan duration during which

enable_express.description: Boolean flag which controls whether Express Entities

enable_partitioning.description: Boolean flag which controls whether to enable
enable_partitioning.notes: Partitioning is available at entity creation for all queues and topics in Basic or Standard SKUs. It is not available for the Premium messaging SKU, but any previously existing partitioned entities in Premium namespaces continue to work as expected. Please [see the documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/service-bus-messaging/service-bus-partitioning) for more information.

lock_duration.description: The ISO 8601 timespan duration of a peek-lock; that is, the amount of time that the message is locked for other receivers. Maximum value is 5 minutes. Defaults to 1 minute. (`PT1M`)

max_size_in_megabytes.description: Integer value which controls the size of

requires_session.description: Boolean flag which controls whether the Queue requires sessions.

dead_lettering_on_message_expiration.description: Boolean flag which controls whether the Queue has dead letter support when a message expires. Defaults to `false`.

max_delivery_count.description: Integer value which controls when a message is automatically deadlettered. Defaults to `10`.

create.description: Used when creating the ServiceBus Queue.

update.description: Used when updating the ServiceBus Queue.

read.description: Used when retrieving the ServiceBus Queue.

delete.description: Used when deleting the ServiceBus Queue.
